infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to show nearby rides and provide accurate navigation.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need your location to show nearby rides and provide accurate navigation even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need your location to show nearby rides and provide accurate navigation even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to allow you to take profile pictures and document your rides.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to allow you to select profile pictures and document your rides.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Eco-share to use your location to show nearby rides and provide accurate navigation.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Eco-share to use your location to show nearby rides and provide accurate navigation even when the app is in the background.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Eco-share to use your location to show nearby rides and provide accurate navigation.
